title: Submit user feedback through contact form
preconditions: User is on the contact page
steps:
1. Fill in the name field with 'John Doe'
2. Fill in the email field with 'john.doe@example.com'
3. Fill in the feedback field with 'Great service!'
4. Click the 'Submit' button
expected: A confirmation message is displayed on the screen and a confirmation email is sent to 'john.doe@example.com' containing the ticket number, submitted details, and expected response time.
